name: pikaday
description: A refreshing JavaScript Datepicker â€” lightweight, no dependencies, modular CSS

scripts.test: cross-env rimraf dist && tsc && karma start --single-run
scripts.postbuild:amd: cross-env copyfiles examples/**/* plugins/**/* css/**/* scss/**/* dist/amd
scripts.postbuild:commonjs: cross-env copyfiles examples/**/* plugins/**/* css/**/* scss/**/*  dist/commonjs
scripts.build:es2015: cross-env tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/es2015 --module es2015 --target es2015
scripts.postbuild:es2015: cross-env copyfiles examples/**/* plugins/**/* css/**/* scss/**/*  dist/es2015
scripts.postbuild:native-modules: cross-env copyfiles examples/**/* plugins/**/* css/**/* scss/**/*  dist/native-modules
scripts.postbuild:system: cross-env copyfiles examples/**/* plugins/**/* css/**/* scss/**/*  dist/system
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build:amd" "npm run build:commonjs" "npm run build:es2015" "npm run build:native-modules" "npm run build:system"
scripts.predoc: cross-env rimraf doc/api.json && rimraf dist/doc-temp && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outFile dist/doc-temp/pikaday.js && node doc/shape-defs && copyfiles tsconfig.json dist/doc-temp
scripts.doc: cross-env typedoc --json doc/api.json --excludeExternals --includeDeclarations --mode modules --target ES6 --name pikaday-docs dist/doc-temp/
scripts.prepare-release: cross-env npm run changelog && npm run build && npm run doc
